You wanna grab something to eat?$6"/move Marnie 0 6 2 true/emote farmer 32/pause 500/move Shane -3 0 2 true/move farmer 0 1 2 false/warp farmer -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/doAction 15 12/move Marnie 0 2 2/speak Marnie "Shane, can I have a minute before you head out?"/textAboveHead Shane "Sure."/move Marnie -2 0 2/move Marnie 0 1 3/move Marnie -1 0 2/move Shane 0 -2 0/pause 500/playSound money/pause 500/move Marnie 1 0 2/speak Marnie "Here, take this."/playSound purchase/pause 250/playSound purchase/pause 500/emote Shane 8/pause 500/speak Shane "Uh... do you want me to get you something at the saloon?"/speak Marnie "Well, I won't say no to a slice of Gus's pumpkin pie, but you don't have to get me anything.#$b#That money's yours."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2 true/showFrame Shane 19/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/showFrame Shane 0/stopAnimation Shane/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "...Thanks, but you don't need to give me an allowance.$3#$b#I'm imposing on you enough as it is."/speak Marnie "It's not an allowance, Shane. It's your paycheck."/jump Shane/emote Shane 8/speak Shane "Huh?"/move Marnie 0 -1 1/move Marnie 2 0 2/move Marnie 0 3 3/faceDirection Shane 1 true/move Marnie -1 0 3 true/positionOffset Marnie 0 3/positionOffset Marnie 0 3/positionOffset Marnie 0 3/positionOffset Marnie 0 3/positionOffset Marnie 0 3/speak Marnie "I couldn't offer you a job before, what with the ranch's financial situation...$s#$b#But now that the JojaMart's closed down, orders for our products have been flooding in from the neighboring towns.#$b#I need a full-time ranch hand to help me keep up with them."/pause 1000/speak Marnie "You don't have to take the job, of course.#$b#It's just that you've already done so much to help around here, so it's only right that I compensate you for it."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2 true/showFrame Shane 19/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/speak Marnie "Well, what do you say?"/pause 1000/showFrame Shane 0/stopAnimation Shane/faceDirection Shane 1/positionOffset Shane 12 0/positionOffset Shane 12 0/animate Shane true true 500 34/playSound swordswipe/showFrame Marnie 16/textAboveHead Marnie "Oh!"/pause 500/showFrame Marnie 13/pause 2000/speak Shane "Of course I'm taking the job!$h"/stopAnimation Marnie/stopAnimation Shane/positionOffset Shane -8 0/positionOffset Shane -8 0/positionOffset Shane -8 0/pause 1000/emote Marnie 20/speak Marnie "Oh, I'm glad.$h#$b#I know the pay isn't much, but it's the best I can do right now."/speak Shane "Please, it's more than they ever paid me at fucking JojaMart."/jump Marnie/pause 500/speak Marnie "Shane, language!$3"/speak Shane "Whoops. I mean it's more than they ever paid me at *that* fucking place that won't be named.$6"/faceDirection Marnie 2/pause 400/textAboveHead Marnie "*sigh*"/pause 3000/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/pause 400/speak Shane "Seriously though... I won't let you down."/pause 500/speak Marnie "I know you won't.$h#$b#Now go on, I think we've kept @ waiting long enough.#$b#Bring home a slice of pumpkin pie for me, all right?$h"/speak Shane "Marnie, I'll buy you the whole damn pie.$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2/textAboveHead Shane "Hey, {{PlayerName}}! Dinner's on me!"/pause 1500/move Shane 0 3 2 true/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/end
